about_the_game:
This is the definitive edition of the Bhop Trilogy. In *NEW* FINAL SCUFFED WITH A LITTLE POLISH BHOP EXPERIENCE 2029 BRAIN ROT EDITION (POG CHAMP), where we are introducing things that don't need to be in a sequel and could be in a single update, but I thought it would be funny if I just straight up made a full new game instead.

NEW STUFF
I don't want to share much about this project at the moment but heres what you can expect
- A whole new campaign mode with 15-20 levels (or more still deciding)
- Brand new single-player levels with easter eggs and new obstacles to work with
- All previous single-player levels return including levels that were previously locked behind paid DLC
- Existing zombies modes + brand new modes
- A properly working multiplayer mode
- Brand new tools for speedrunners
- At least 12 months of support for content, and 3 years for crucial bug fixes
- Launch on consoles planned
- New PARTY side modes with concepts from the original scuffed Party game
- Win, MacOS, Linux all supported platforms
